channel.title: Freedom of Information: Use it to find out what Runescape was made in!
channel.description: I really want to know how they made RUnescape, so Im going to declare they have to tell me because of FOI ;D

item.title: Freedom of Information: Use it to find out what Runescape was made in!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:53, topic:29706”][quote author=Tommy2k4 link=topic=43610.msg561457#msg561457 date=1165127285]

alright! runescape is written in java dont belive me? deob a client and run it as if it was a java app and it’ll work, try to run it as a c/c++ program… omg theres no exe!! and the freedom of information act only applies to certan parts of europe and austraila as far as i know

no! runescape is writtin in html dont belive me? click view > source and… omg it says !!
[/quote]

Ffs, stupid 300 char sig limit…[/quote]

You lack comprehension skills for sarcasm.

Read full topic

item.title: Freedom of Information: Use it to find out what Runescape was made in!
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

I have the RS source and I’m releasing it to the public!!!

/* RuneScape (c) (infinty) JAGeX */

/* - Begin useless comment full of random shit

sdfasd
fa
sdf
asdf
asd
fa
sdf
asd
rha
e5h
we
rt
sdf
tgs
dt'
sed'tf
sd
ft's
dfys
d'
g'j
f'g
sd
fas
dfa
sdsad
gfasd
gh
fdh
 - End comment - */

import jagex.*.*;
import crappyGames.*.*;

public class RuneScape extends JAGeX implements Lag
{
     public static void main(String[] args)
     {
            if(isNewPlayer)
            {
                  login();
                  runTutorial();
                  causeAddiction();
                  deleteOneMilFromAddictsBank();
                  makeAddictGoSuicide();
                  legallyWinCourt();
            }
            else if(isAddicted)
            {
                  deleteOneMilFromAddictsBank();
                  makeAddictGoSuicide();
                  legallyWinCourt();
            }
            else
            {
                  gay();
            }
     }
}

I like their commenting skills XD

Read full topic

no! runescape is writtin in html dont belive me? click view > source and… omg it says !![/quote]

iamaminer1:

rofl, your an idiot. Java is not a c++ language, they are just very similar. Because of a simple statement (that is wrong) you claim he is an expert…

item.title: Freedom of Information: Use it to find out what Runescape was made in!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Meh. Before I came to, I used to be an active members of the RS forum. There was a thread in there where Andrew himself said

Andr3w G0w3r:

“… the core of the game is written in Java, the details are written with RuneScript, a custom scripting language I developed that lets the content team add a high amount of updates in relatively short time …”

So can we get a lock ?

Read full topic

item.title: Freedom of Information: Use it to find out what Runescape was made in!
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

Hey heres an idea!

I’ll call one of there server hosts in Virginia and ask “Hey does Jagex use Java or C++ in their servers” :rolleyes:

Who the fuck cares…

I would say it is written in Java, but I could always be wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: Freedom of Information: Use it to find out what Runescape was made in!

item.title: Freedom of Information: Use it to find out what Runescape was made in!
item.dc:creator: @Morgoth Morgoth
item.description:
@Morgoth wrote:

There is Java HotSpot, which is as fast or sometimes even faster than native code. For 2k players maintaining enough bandwidth is even a bigger problem than server speed. IMHO, server bandwith problems is what causes the most lag during peak hours.
As for FoI, it does not forbid closed source. If it would, M$ would need to officially release all their code

Read full topic
